attributes.action: cap the fuel prices at the pumps to £1.00 per litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the current strike action at Grangemouth, petrol prices have soared to ridiculous amounts. The Government of this country should introduce a cap on the price of a litre of fuel of £1.00 for diesel and petrol

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
